page.title: 19What life's like in Morden
page.content: I really like it where I live because its not too noisy and not quiet.We know nearly everybody in our street and we are always talking over fences and gardens. Over the back of our houses people are putting up new houses.This really makes me mad because it used to be a big field which everybody used to use for playing in, giving their dogs a good run in, for the Youth Club, football club on Sundays and in the summer blackberries and straw berries grew there.Now the fields are a mess.There's guttering,pipes,planks of wood and even machines left everywhere.Last year when they had just started digging up the ground a mechanical digger was switched on by some children, driven around and left on all night.A big sort of garage has now been put up { continued
